items.title: teomyth/metarize: A lightweight, ESM-compatible TypeScript metadata library for creating and inspecting decorators with zero dependencies

items.content_html: This is a Pomodoro-based task tracking application built with Angular and Tauri. Utilized: Frontend: Angular, Backend: Tauri (Rust-powered desktop app framework), Database: LokiJS (Lightweight NoSQL storage), Charts: Chart.js (Time spent tracking)
items.title: emintt/pomodoro-app: This is a Pomodoro-based task tracking application built with Angular and Tauri. Utilized: Frontend: Angular, Backend: Tauri (Rust-powered desktop app framework), Database: LokiJS (Lightweight NoSQL storage), Charts: Chart.js (Time spent tracking)

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
items.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight and powerful WYSIWYG editor in vanilla JavaScript. No dependencies.

items.content_html: 🚀 A lightweight and customizable onboarding tour library for web applications. Create step-by-step interactive guides, highlight UI elements, and enhance user experience with media support, highlight styles, and confetti celebration! 🎉
items.title: Faizu9264/onboarding-tour-faizu: 🚀 A lightweight and customizable onboarding tour library for web applications. Create step-by-step interactive guides, highlight UI elements, and enhance user experience with media support, highlight styles, and confetti celebration! 🎉

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible, and customizable modal alert system for React — perfect for confirmations, warnings, success, error messages, and more. It supports dynamic themes, multiple layout variants, and status-based icon rendering.
items.title: codx-ak/react-smart-alerts: A lightweight, flexible, and customizable modal alert system for React — perfect for confirmations, warnings, success, error messages, and more. It supports dynamic themes, multiple layout variants, and status-based icon rendering.
